title: Why is iron lower than bronze?
body: This goes against my years of playing RuneScape. You made bronze before you could make iron. Fix this oversight.

replies.body: Bronze is worth more $ than iron, just like gold is worth more  then silver.. haha platinum is somtime worth less than gold... go figure, but diamond is always worth alot more than all.
because it's made up of more than 1 type of metal, jebus crisps

> [{quoted}](name=Pikachoochoo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oWm1EEQx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-02-20T21:43:14.794+0000)
>
> because it's made up of more than 1 type of metal, jebus crisps

Whatever, Pikachoochoo.

I feel like they put Iron below Bronze because it'd be too hard to tell the difference between Iron and Silver.

I feel like 'Trainee' or 'Apprentice' would have been a better name for the Iron rank.
bronze is a better looking metal.
